release.name: Enhanced Particles + Hotfix
release.notes: 120 particles with bigger radius and slower movement. Critical syntax fix for particle system.

changes: ğŸ” DYNAMIC OBFUSCATION - Next-Level Anti-Theft Protection

ğŸ² ADVANCED NAME GENERATION SYSTEM:

- Seed randomized every session using tick() + math.random()

ğŸ” DYNAMICALLY OBFUSCATED ELEMENTS:

- chip (Controller): Changes every launch (e.g., SysRefB7)

âœ… USER EXPERIENCE:
